lead_paragraph: Opening arguments are expected to be delivered on Thursday in Sacramento Superior Court in the trial of Bill Honig, California's Superintendent of Public Instruction, to determine whether he illegally profited from his office. The case, which Mr. Honig and his supporters say is motivated by politics, threatens to end the 10-year political career of one of the nation's most respected reformers of education.

headline.main: Trial Opens Today For California Chief Of Public Education
